systems.description: A set of different systems of units in the form of a flattened tree

name.description: A formal name for the unit system

inherits.description: The key of the system it inherits from, if any

historical.description: True if the unit system is not in current usage, else false

dimensions.description: A set of types of recognized physical dimensions that can be measured

name.description: The common name of the dimension

otherNames.description: Other names that are used to describe the dimension

symbol.description: The standard symbol of the dimension

otherSymbols.description: Other symbols that are used to signify the dimension

baseUnit.description: The key of the unit that is other units can convert to/from

derived.description: Describes how this dimension is derived from base dimensions. Multiple dimensions or a placeholder ('1') may be used, separated my * (multiplication) or / (division) symbols

dimensionless.description: True if the dimension is dimensionless, else false. Defaults to false.

units.description: A set of units that can be used to describe the dimension

name.description: The standard name of the unit

plural.description: The plural form of the standard name of the unit

otherNames.description: A set of other names that the unit is known by

symbol.description: The standard symbol of the dimension. Only optional if unit does not have a symbol

otherSymbols.description: Other symbols used to signify the unit

symbolFirst.description: Determines if the symbol should appear before the value. Defaults to false

type.description: An enum describing the type of a unit and how it should be treated. range, fractional, whole may be added later

systems.description: A set of unit systems that use this unit
required needs to be set to true!

excludedSystems.description: A set of unit systems that are not allowed to use this unit. Useful for excluding specific systems classified lower in the system tree

tags.description: A set of tags to describe additional properties of a unit

multiplier.description: A scale factor to multiply by when converting from the base unit to this unit. Default is 1

offset.description: A constant offset to add when converting from base unit to this unit

estimation.description: True if the multiplier and/or offset are estimated or not exact

rare.description: True if the unit rarely used within the unit systems it is part of, else false. Defaults to false

acceptedPrefixes.description: A set of the names of acceptable prefixes to apply to this unit

excludedPrefixes.description: A set of names of unacceptable prefixes to apply to this unit

prefixName.description: The prefix already applied to this unit.

prefixFreeName.description: The name of the unit without prefix applied.
